title: Practice Challenge
description: Create an app that displays your profile with various text styles: 1. Your name in large, bold text 2. Your age in medium, colored text 3. Your favorite quote in italic text 4. A fun fact about you in underlined text 5. Use at least 4 different colors ---
instructions: Create an app that displays your profile with various text styles: 1. Your name in large, bold text 2. Your age in medium, colored text 3. Your favorite quote in italic text 4. A fun fact about you in underlined text 5. Use at least 4 different colors ---

testCases.description: Profile displays name with bold styling
testCases.expectedOutput: Text widget with fontSize: 32, fontWeight: bold, color: deepPurple

testCases.description: Quote text displays with italic style
testCases.expectedOutput: Text widget with fontStyle: italic rendered

testCases.description: Fun fact displays with underline decoration

hints.text: Use the `TextStyle` object inside the `style` property of a `Text` widget.
For italics, use `fontStyle: FontStyle.italic`. For bold, use `fontWeight: FontWeight.bold`.
To underline text, use `decoration: TextDecoration.underline` inside your `TextStyle`.

commonMistakes.correction: Use exact case: main not Main, print not Print
